actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 so as to make more current the amounts prescribed in determining the amount of income to which the retirement income credit under such code is allowable.

summary.text: Increases the amounts prescribed for determining the amount of income to which the retirement income credit under the Internal Revenue Code is allowable.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 so as to make more current the amounts prescribed in determining the amount of income to which the retirement income credit under such code is allowable.
